Exercise 1 (Self-Introduction Vlog)

FB link: Self-Introduction Vlog

Exercises Reflection

The Self-Introduction Vlog served as an essential starting point for my engagement with the course. Through this activity, I introduced myself, presented websites that I personally value, and articulated both my motivations for enrolling and my prior exposure to HTML. This allowed me to reflect on my expectations and readiness for the subject while expressing genuine curiosity toward the field of web design. Overall, this exercise provided a foundational understanding of the courseâ€™s purpose and helped establish a meaningful direction for my learning journey in Web Design.
